Cannabis sativa é uma planta herbácea da família das Canabiáceas, amplamente cultivada em muitas partes do mundo. As folhas são finamente recortadas em segmentos lineares; as flores, unissexuais e inconspícuas, têm pêlos granulosos que, nas femininas, segregam uma resina; o caule possui fibras industrialmente importantes, conhecidas como cânhamo; e a resina tem propriedades psicoativas bem documentadas podendo actuar como analgésico, anódino, antiemético, antiespasmódico, calmante do sistema nervoso, embriagador, estomático, narcótico, sedativo, tônico.

The game is pretty fun, you should wait to buy it cheaper, around 10€. If you can play with at least one friend, the game will be super fun, and your time will be worthy, doing games, grinding points to unlock perks to each character. 
You will find ur favorite survivour and probably main it for a while! Sometimes you will rage a bit but laugh a lot as well!!!!!

Conclusion:
Should you buy it? Yes.
Is it fun? Yes, a lot.

Dead by daylight is a top secret torture method that is developed by Behavior, this game is very bad, and i don't recommend to anyone, you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game, thankfully spending about 30 minutes and Dead By Daylight makes u retarded. In dbd u can visit very interesting locations like: Ormond or Haddonfield, nothing else. This game will bring u very fun experiences and fond memories. U can play as the survivor who need to repair generators to escape, playing as suvivor is very ez considering this game is very balanced, the only thing u need to watch out for are ramdom survivors that intellect of a Plants Vs Zombies pea shoter. U can also play the killer who kills the survivors, dont worry, out of every killer only like 3(Nurse, Spirit, Hag) are viable on high ranks, and u need to apply presure to 4 people at the same time while are you're playing padded jaws trapper. Thankfully after 4 years this game still feels like its in alpha, its not dbd if the map doesnt have shit hitboxes and its full with bugs, this game also consists of very fun cosmetics like a 15$ trapper skin and pure cancer, overall this game is very shit its also like 100$ with every DLC, 0/10

In the beginning I really, really liked this game. Overtime I started to see the enormous flaws in this game. Hitboxes haven't been fixed in about 2 years and that will piss you off. 
To be clear, the principle of this game is fun and unique, but the way it's put together is a recipe for rage.
ONLY play this game if you can handle bullshit really well.

Despues de jugarlo como 2 años puedo NO RECOMENDAR ESTE JUEGO DE MIERDA
Porque?
1) ES UN SIMULADOR DE BUGS ESTA REMIL CAGADA
2)el crossplaying te empareja con jugadores inutiles de rango iridicesnte que no hacen NADA!
3)ESTA LLENO DE TROLLS, jugue hoy para hacer misiones y sin mentir ME TOCO 3 VECES SEGUIDAS TODOS TROLLS
4)las perks son pro surv, no podes jugar de killer , es una mierda ser killer , en serio UNA MIERDA
5)por las cagadas de las perks y el desbalance entre el surv y el killer , los killers son mas camperos,tuneleros y sucios (son killers pero la experiencia es una reverenda soreteada)
6) LOS DEVS DE DEAD BY DAYLIGHT SE CONCENTRAN MAS EN HACER SKINS QUE EN ARREGLAR LOS BUGS
7) en serio NO LO COMPREN! , si se supone que es el unico juego que tiene exito en su compañia , porque hacen mas skins que arreglar el juego , o balancear los killers para que sea mas divertido?
8) SE CAGAN EN VOS POR LAS DENUNCIAS POR LOS HACKERS

Ich mag Dead by Daylight. Die Spieler sind super sozial und ein guter Killer, der alle Überlebenden tötet, lässt manchmal den letzten entkommen. 
Ausserdem macht man im Spiel schnelle Vortschritte. Sowas motiviert.
Danke Entwickler für dieses wunderbare Spiel

Amazing CO-OP Strategy Horror game,really puts the teamwork experience to the max as well it gives you a nice thrill sometimes. Definitely  recommending this game.Really worth the money.The in-game currency(paid)is cheap,so you can afford a lot of the killers/slashers and survivors. GLHF!
Highly suggest for fans of horror and skillful play.
